nodes.name: Research Specialist
nodes.goal: Gather comprehensive information on the given topic
nodes.backstory: Experienced researcher with a knack for finding reliable sources

nodes.name: Content Writer
nodes.goal: Create engaging and informative content based on research
nodes.backstory: Skilled writer with experience in various niches and styles

nodes.name: Editor
nodes.goal: Refine and polish the content for publication
nodes.backstory: Detail-oriented editor with a keen eye for quality and consistency

nodes.name: Conduct Research
nodes.description: Research the topic 'The Future of AI in Healthcare' and compile key findings
nodes.expected_output: A comprehensive research document with key points and sources

nodes.name: Write Blog Post
nodes.description: Write a 1500-word blog post on 'The Future of AI in Healthcare' based on the research

nodes.name: Edit and Finalize
nodes.description: Review, edit, and finalize the blog post for publication

nodes.name: Save Research
nodes.arg: {'filename': 'research_findings.md', 'content': 'Detailed research on The Future of AI in Healthcare'}

nodes.name: Save Draft
nodes.arg: {'filename': 'blog_post_draft.md', 'content': 'Draft of the blog post on The Future of AI in Healthcare'}

nodes.name: Save Final Post
nodes.arg: {'filename': 'final_blog_post.md', 'content': 'Finalized blog post on The Future of AI in Healthcare'}
